articles.author: Allen Kim, CNN
articles.title: Running is enjoying a boom because of the coronavirus pandemic
articles.description: Gyms are closed. Spin classes and boot camps are canceled. Worst of all, you're stuck at home for most of the day. As people look for an outlet to exercise and escape the confines of self-isolation at home, running has seen a boom.
articles.content:
Run solo.
 Practice safe social distancing and avoid crowded areas.
 Run against traffic, as it's easy to see incoming vehicles and for you to be able to react to them.
 Don't overexert yourself, and make sure you properly rest and recover.

articles.author: Francesca Street, CNN
articles.title: What happened on board the last cruise ship still at sea
articles.description: As coronavirus fears emptied the seas of cruise ships, the Costa Deliziosa was the last major vessel still on the water carrying a significant number of passengers. This is what was unfolding on board.
articles.content:
Francesca Street, CNNPublished 25th April 2020

articles.author: Hadas Gold, CNN Business
articles.title: Wary Germans hate sharing their data. Will they use a Covid-19 tracking app?
articles.description: Germany hopes to have a tracking app ready to download within a few weeks. But details are scarce, and if the app is to succeed, Germans will have to overcome a widespread reluctance to share data with authorities that is rooted deep in the country's history.
